subtitle: what role for Washington?
title: Plug-in electric vehicles
subjects: Electric vehicles -- Government policy -- United States

description.value: "Explains the current landscape for plug-in electrics and implications for national security, the environment, and the economy. Discusses what can and should be done by the U.S. government to advance the role of plug-in electric vehicles"--Provided by publisher.
